mapper.select: select m.musicrank as musicrank, m.musicsubject as musicsubject, m.musicvideo as musicvideo, a.albumimg as albumimg, ar.artistname as artistname, a.albumname as albumname, m.musicnumber as musicnumber from music as m inner join album as a on m.albumnumber=a.albumnumber inner join artist as ar on m.artistnumber=ar.artistnumber AND musicrank<=#{limit} ORDER BY musicrank asc
select plyalistNumber from music where usernumber=#{userNumber}

select m.musicrank as musicrank, m.musicsubject as musicsubject, m.musicvideo as musicvideo, a.albumimg as albumimg, ar.artistname as artistname, a.albumname as albumname, m.musicnumber as musicnumber from music as m inner join album as a on m.albumnumber=a.albumnumber inner join artist as ar on m.artistnumber=ar.artistnumber AND albumgenre=#{genre} AND musicrank<=#{limit} ORDER BY musicrank asc
